casebody.data:
IN RE: William Christopher BEARY NO. 2019-B-0262 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 25, 2019

ORDER

Considering the Joint Petition for Interim Suspension filed by respondent, William Christopher Beary, and the Office of Disciplinary Counsel,

IT IS ORDERED that William Christopher Beary, Louisiana Bar Roll number 22253, be and he hereby is suspended from the practice of law on an interim basis pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 19.3, pending further orders of this court. Pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 26(E), this order is effective immediately.
